headline: Is Sempra (SRE) the Most Undervalued Utility Stock to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Most Undervalued Utility Stocks to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Sempra (NYSE:SRE) stands against other most undervalued utility stocks to invest in now. EY believes that utilities are required to balance growing energy demands, decarbonization goals and customer satisfaction […]
